ygData.subject: Re: Eye of Zomm
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, nothing is really wrong with it.  I just noticed in one of the patch messages that they were going to fix it so that we can move the Eye up and down
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, nothing is really wrong with it. I just noticed in one of the patch
messages that they were going to fix it so that we can move the Eye up and
down instead of just on a level (low) plane. It should be quite an
improvement.



----- Original Message -----
From: Dominic Franchetti <DFranchetti@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 9:28 AM
Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Bind Sight


> From: Dominic Franchetti <DFranchetti@...>
>
> I sent it to Verant the other day but they will look at it, let alone
> fix, as fast as anything else they have to work on. What is wrong with
> Eye of Zomm?
>
>
& FAMILY. See homepage.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
